item.title: Taika Waititi to Direct ‘Judge Dredd’ Movie
item.description: Taika Waititi, the Oscar-winning filmmaker of “Jojo Rabbit” and two “Thor” movies, has set sights on his next project. He’s attached to direct “Judge Dredd,”
